Title: Prohibits firearms in polling places
Summary: Prohibits firearms in polling places; establishes the crime of criminal possession of a weapon in a polling place; makes it a class E felony to possess a rifle, shotgun, or firearm in or within 100 feet of a polling place on the day of a primary, special or general election or while early voting is in progress.
LawCode: Amd ยง400.00, add ยง265.01-f, Pen L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law, in relation to establishing the crime of criminal possession of a weapon in a polling place
